entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxBusiness President Trump politics aside,America is in dire threat of coronavirus & we need our White House Pandemic office that V.P. Biden & President Obama opened restored with EPA.Americas lust for Wealth should not exceed Our survival measures & Planet 🌎 demands all of our attention🌈
